A wist of wewative fiwe paths pointing to JSON fiwes fowwowing the [custom data fowmat](https://github.com/micwosoft/vscode-css-wanguagesewvice/bwob/masta/docs/customData.md).

VS Code woads custom data on stawtup to enhance its CSS suppowt fow the custom CSS pwopewties, at diwectives, pseudo cwasses and pseudo ewements you specify in the JSON fiwes.

The fiwe paths awe wewative to wowkspace and onwy wowkspace fowda settings awe considewed.
